branchCategory.name: LEY-X5, Electric Actuator, Rod Type, Dust/Drip Proof (AC Servo Motor: 100/200W)
branchCategory.description: The X5 option, available for the LEY series in sizes 25 and 32, is a dust and drip proof specification equivalent to IP65. The AC servo motors do not require enclosures, but the scraper and lube-retainer configurations are included. Additionally, the body extrusion includes a vent hole and fitting to balance internal pressure so that dust and water are not drawn in.
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>IP65 environmental rating. AC servo motor and cable are IP65 rated without an enclosure <LI>Body sizes: 25, 32 <LI>Maximum work load: 60 kg (horizontal); 46 kg (vertical) <LI>Maximum pushing force: 736 N <LI>Maximum stroke: 500 mm <LI>Positioning repeatability: ±0.02 mm <LI>Motor available with either incremental 17-bit or absolute 18-bit encoder <LI>Lube-retainer retains grease oil film on rod </LI></UL>

breadCrumb.name: LEY-X5, Electric Actuator, Rod Type, Dust/Drip Proof (AC Servo Motor: 100/200W)
